name: Ron Sweet
bio: Ron Sweet published cryptic crosswords on his website from 2001–09, and one of his non-cryptic crosswords appeared in the New York Times in 2004. An LA resident and native, he was a winner on the game show Merv Griffin's Crosswords in 2007.

name: Marc Maximov
bio: Marc Maximov is an audio producer, multimedia creator, and writer based in Durham, NC. From 2012–14, he edited a monthly crossword puzzle, Solve Locally, for the local weekly newspaper IndyWeek.

name: Kay Plunkett
bio: Kayla is a software engineer and puzzle lover based in Dallas, TX. They discovered cryptic puzzles during the 2024 NPL conference, have been solving PuzzledPint sets since 2021, and have been making up silly puzzles for friends for a score at least.
